1312330.name: Get Out... Demo
1312330.description:
In a dark room,
the Father should start finding his way to get out from this strange House.

while he must to find his way to escape, he will face different mysteries to solve and monsters to escape from.

and it's hard than you think...

Take your HandLight and find your path to get away from this mystery loop.
1312330.supported_languages:
英语*, 阿拉伯语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
